question: What statue is located in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini, Greece?
asked_question_translated: ¿Qué estatua se encuentra en la plaza central de Evgenia, en Keratsini (Grecia)?
answer: La estatua que se encuentra en la plaza central de Evgenia, en Keratsini (Grecia), es la "Statue of the Asia Minor Mother."
answer_translated_eng: The statue in the central square of Evgenia in Keratsini (Greece) is the "Statue of the Asia Minor Mother".
